snippet: New U.S. fuel efficiency standards for cars and light trucks should accelerate sales of electric-powered and hybrid vehicles. What prevents more people from buying more energy efficient vehicles? Do they have to get better before drivers are willing...
abstract: New U.S. fuel efficiency standards for cars and light trucks should accelerate sales of electric-powered and hybrid vehicles. What prevents more people from buying more energy efficient vehicles? Do they have to get better before drivers are willing to make the switch?

headline.main: Fuel Efficiency Standard Could Jump-Start Electric Cars
